unsuited.translation[0].definitions[0].d: not having the right qualities for a particular job or purpose
unsuited.translation[0].definitions[0].e: old school buildings unsuited to modern education
He was unsuited for the job.
unsuited.translation[0].definitions[1].d: two people who are unsuited are unlikely to have a successful romantic relationship because they have very different characters and interests
unsuited.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I now realize that Tom and I were totally unsuited.
